titles.title: A concurrent resolution stating that no action be taken on any legislative proposal on the President's program unless it is a unified package containing offsets for any additional expenditures through cuts in programs or increased taxes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2153)

Referred jointly to the Committees on Budget; Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, with instructions that if one Committee reports, the other Committee have thirty days to report or be discharged.

bill.summary: 2/25/1993--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that no action should be taken on any legislative proposal on the President's economic program unless it is a unified package containing offsets for any additional expenditures through cuts in programs or increased taxes.
